Package com.google.gwt.gwtai.applet.client

Classes required on the client-side (place the GwtAI-Client.jar in your GWT classpath).

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Applet A tag interface that facilitates compile-time creation of an handle objects for Java Applet classes.
AppletCallback<T> The interface one must implement to receive responses from an applet.
 

Class Summary
AppletAccomplice This abstract class provides functionality that is only meant to be used within the GwtAI library.
AppletJSUtil GWT-side utility class.
CallbackUtil Injects code to bridge between GWT and applets.
 

Enum Summary
Align.Alignment  
 

Annotation Types Summary
Align The Align Annotation specifies the value that is filled into the applet's ALIGN attribute.
Archive The Archive Annotation specifies the value that is filled into the applet's ARCHIVE attribute.
Codebase The Codebase Annotation specifies the value that is filled into the applet's CODEBASE attribute.
Height The Height Annotation specifies the value that is filled into the applet's HEIGHT attribute.
ImplementingClass The type of the actual Applet implementation.
Params The Param Annotation specifies the value that is filled into the applet's PARAM attribute.
Width The Width Annotation specifies the value that is filled into the applet's WIDTH attribute.
 

Package com.google.gwt.gwtai.applet.client Description

Classes required on the client-side (place the GwtAI-Client.jar in your GWT classpath).
